QuestData.Title: Fighting Back
QuestData.Description: The refuge's defenders have done their best to blunt the iron dwarves' attacks, but we keep losing ground inch by inch. My men are hardy, but not tireless. Without reinforcements, it's only a matter of time until we will be overrun.$B$BWould you lend your skills to the refuge's defense? It would greatly improve the morale of the defenders and give them -- and me -- hope of mounting a counterattack.$B$BKill any of the stormforged or their creations you encounter outside the refuge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bouldercrag the Rockshaper wants you to slay 10 Stormforged Attackers and return to him at Bouldercrag's Refuge. You may kill either Stormforged Raiders or Stormforged Reavers.
QuestData.RewardText: You've given the defenders something to cheer about. Seeing the enemy fall by your hand has reinvigorated them and bolstered their courage.
